pl.criteria
Class PersistentCriteria

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--pl.criteria.PersistentCriteria
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeleteCriteria, RetrieveCriteria
public abstract class PersistentCriteria
extends java.lang.Object

This is abstract class for all criteria. If a name of attribute in addSelectXxx methods has aaa.bbb form a criteria part will be generated for the attribute bbb of the referenced object with the target aaa
